# Return to the Sea, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Druid Spells|Druid 7]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid, 13]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Components:** V, S, M (a live lungfish and a small carving of a sahuagin made from the ivory of a narwhale \[v. 5,000 gp])

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Permanent

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** The Mageâ€™s Tower website

This spell grafts gills to the neck or chest of the target. These gills do not replace the normal respiratory system of the creature, rather the gills work in addition to it, allowing the target to breathe water when needed.

The affected creature gains the amphibian template (cf. Stormwrack 136).
